required.name: GRAVITY_FORMS_CONSUMER_KEY
required.description: Consumer Key from WordPress admin: Forms > Settings > REST API

required.name: GRAVITY_FORMS_CONSUMER_SECRET
required.description: Consumer Secret from WordPress admin: Forms > Settings > REST API

required.name: GRAVITY_FORMS_BASE_URL
required.description: Your WordPress site URL (no trailing slash)
